overdrive_modes_data.name: stoic
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character takes damage from an enemy.

overdrive_modes_data.name: warrior
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character damages an enemy (excluding items and overdrives).

overdrive_modes_data.name: comrade
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when an ally takes damage.

overdrive_modes_data.name: healer
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when healing an ally, even with full HP.

overdrive_modes_data.name: tactician
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character inflicts status ailments onto an enemy.

overdrive_modes_data.name: victim
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when an enemy inflicts status ailments onto the character.

overdrive_modes_data.name: dancer
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character evades an enemy attack.

overdrive_modes_data.name: avenger
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when an enemy KO's an ally.

overdrive_modes_data.name: slayer
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character kills an enemy, including via stealing from Machina enemies and treasure chests. Weapons of Warrior Monks, Fallen Monks, Kimahri and Yojimbo (boss battles) also count.

overdrive_modes_data.name: hero
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character kills an enemy with at least 10,000 HP, or at least 20x more HP than the estimated damage. For learning this mode, the amount is only 3x more HP. Estimated damage is damage dealt by the character's 'Attack' command, regardless of enemy Defense.

overdrive_modes_data.name: rook
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character reduces or nullifies the damage inflicted by an enemy with Nulspells, Protect, Shell, and Reflect

overdrive_modes_data.name: victor
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when winning a battle while being an active fighter.

overdrive_modes_data.name: coward
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills when the character escapes from battle. Using 'Flee' is also counted, regardless of who uses it.

overdrive_modes_data.name: ally
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills at the start of the character's turn.

overdrive_modes_data.name: sufferer
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills at the start of the character's turn while afflicted with a status ailment.

overdrive_modes_data.name: daredevil
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills at the start of the character's turn while in 'HP Critical' status.

overdrive_modes_data.name: loner
overdrive_modes_data.description: The gauge fills at the start of the character's turn while fighting alone.
